column2: #Remove effect sizes more than 3 SD away from the mean effect (in both positive and negative directions)
db$nooutlier = ifelse(db$g_calc > mean(db$g_calc, na.rm = TRUE) + 3*sd(db$g_calc, na.rm = TRUE)
| db$g_calc < mean(db$g_calc, na.rm = TRUE) - 3*sd(db$g_calc, na.rm = TRUE),FALSE, TRUE)
#Drop experiments using accented speech (which is not clearly native or non-native)
#Drop experiments with non-typical infants (e.g, bilingual, premature)
#Drop studies that have a bounded object on screen
